import React from 'react'; export const Breadcrumbs: React.FC = ({ items }) =>
{items.join(' > ')}
;

import React from 'react';
export const Slider: React.FC<any> = (props) => <input type='range' {...props} />;

import React from 'react'; export const Switch: React.FC = ({ on }) =>
;

import React from 'react'; export const ProgressBar: React.FC = ({ value }) =>
;

import React from 'react'; export const Rating: React.FC = ({ stars }) =>
{'★'.repeat(stars)}{'☆'.repeat(5-stars)}
;

import React from 'react'; export const Skeleton: React.FC = ({ w, h }) =>
;
